title: Impatient and Angry (4R307)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Skirmish: Exert Sam to make him strength +3. If Sam wins this skirmish, you may remove a burden.
Lore:	“He planted himself… as if he was addressing a young hobbit who had offered him what he called 'sauce' when questioned about visits to the orchard.”
Rarity:	R
